# Discovering outliers by Z-Score
ZScore = np.abs(stats.zscore(data))
print("

Checking where outliers are less than the ZScore")
print("ZScore > 1
",np.where(ZScore > 1)[0],"
",np.where(ZScore > 1)[1],"
")
print("ZScore > 2
",np.where(ZScore > 2)[0],"
",np.where(ZScore > 2)[1],"
")
print("ZScore > 3
",np.where(ZScore > 3)[0],"
",np.where(ZScore > 3)[1],"
